title: Session Agenda Coming Soon
content: The full session agenda is almost here! Stay tuned for a detailed schedule featuring live and on-demand content.

title: Keynote Speaker Revealed
content: Kirill Gavrylyuk, VP of Azure Cosmos DB, will deliver the keynote, sharing exciting announcements and the future of AI-driven databases.

title: Azure Cosmos DB Conf 2025 CFP Closed!
content: Azure Cosmos DB Cconf 2025 Call for Papers (CFP) is now closed. Thank you to all who submitted their proposals!
